_json.title: DIY Lush-like Shampoo Bar // No Lye To Handle!
_json.gridTitle: DIY Lush-like Shampoo Bar // No Lye To Handle!
_json.description: This beauty recipe is perfect for those of you who never made a shampoo bar before as I replaced lye (used for saponification) with an organic pre-made melt-and-pour soap base. This DIY shampoo bar requires only four ingredients, can be customized with your favorite oils and fragrance, and makes a great gift! #lush #solidshampoo #shampoobar #nolye #organic #shampoo #dryshampoo #homemade #homemadebeauty #haircare #diy

creator.name: So Green So Good | DIY Organic Beauty
